snippet.title: Gibbon: Beyond the Trees Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Gibbon: Beyond the Trees is an ecological adventure about freedom and survival.
Coming on February 25th to Apple Arcade. Early 2022 to Nintendo Switch and PC & Mac. http://www.gibbongame.com

Sign-up to get notified at launch:
Apple Arcade: https://apple.co/-Gibbon
Steam: https://s.team/a/1837330
Newsletter: https://brokenrul.es/newsletter

Players must master a dynamic movement system to swing, slide and somersault through a hand-painted jungle, experiencing the story of a lost gibbon searching for home amid rising devastation.

Gibbon deals with challenging real world environmental issues, including deforestation, poaching and climate change that threatens the life of gibbons. Find out more at http://www.gibbongame.com.
